de.Body:

die Erinnerungszeit f√ºr das gesperrte Ticket [<KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::Hook><KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::HookDivider><KIX_TICKET_TicketNumber>] wurde erreicht.

de.Subject: Erinnerungszeit des gesperrten Tickets erreicht: <KIX_TICKET_Title>

en.Body:
Hi <KIX_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_UserFirstname>,

the pending reminder time of the locked ticket [<KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::Hook><KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::HookDivider><KIX_TICKET_TicketNumber>] has been reached.

<KIX_CONFIG_HttpType>://<KIX_CONFIG_FQDN>/<KIX_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentTicketZoom;TicketID=<KIX_TICKET_TicketID>

-- <KIX_CONFIG_NotificationSenderName>
en.Subject: Locked Ticket Pending Reminder Time Reached: <KIX_TICKET_Title>
